newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thailand to decide on Oman LNG by August - minister.
newsitem.headline: Thailand to decide on Oman LNG by August - minister.

text.p: Thailand is likely to make a decision on whether to buy the liquefied natural gas (LNG) from Oman by August, Industry Minister Korn Dhabbaransi said.
Korn told Reuters that he would leave for Japan on Sunday to gather information on the advantages and disadvantages of LNG use.
"I must have enough information to be able defend my decision convincingly to my colleagues whether we should buy LNG or not," he said.

Korn said the government did not have to decide quickly, as it remained a buyer's market. The task was to the prices of LNG from Oman with natural gas from sources in Burma, Indonesia and Thai-Malaysian joint development area (JDA).
Thailand's previous government and Oman had signed a memorandum of understanding in March 1996 to buy 1.7-2.2 million tonnes of LNG per year for 25 years.
Under the initial agreement, state-run Petroleum Authority of Thailand (PTT) agreed to pay $3.10 per million BTU (British Thermal Unit) of LNG cif Rayong.
There is a cost of about $1.00 per MMBTU for regasifying the LNG, making a gross of $4.10 MMBTU, according to a well-informed industry source.
The two parties were originally scheduled to sign a purchasing agreement in March this year. But the Thai industry ministry had recently delayed the scheme.
Ample potential supplies of natural gas in the region, especially from Indonesia's mega project Natuna, prompted Thailand to rethink the whole strategies of natural gas procurment.

Korn said besides the prices, he will also consider the cost of buying LNG from Oman. In buying LNG, Thailand will have to invest a lot of money in building facilities such as LNG import terminal and storage tanks.

However, he noted that Omani LNG offered a few advantages as it contained ethane and higher hydrocarbon and offered the opportunity for their extraction for petrochemical feedstock use while natural gas in region did not have such properties.
